department.dept_long_name: Department of East Asian Languages and Civilizations

course.course_group: East Asian Film and Media Studies
course.title: Three Times + 1. Transitional Moments in Film and Media Culture in Japan: Seminar
course.description: This seminar will focus on transitional moments in the history of film and media culture in Japan, all of them embedded in decisive socio-political shifts. It will explore the deep transformations manifesting around the years 1927, 1963, and 1995, with an additional focus on 1973.
